text: An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the MSI GL Series GL63 8SE-209 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL63 8SE-209 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GL Series GL63 8SE-209 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL63 8SE-209 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the MSI GL Series GL63 8SE-209 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
